predictions.text: USD/JPY (Yahoo Finance: JPY=X) will trade at or above 152.50 on at least one UTC trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmed if Yahoo Finance (ticker: JPY=X) shows an intraday high >= 152.50 on any UTC trading day on or before 2025-11-30.
monitoring_signals: BOJ policy guidance and JGB purchase operations
Japan MoF FX intervention rhetoric or operations
DXY index momentum and risk sentiment
predictions.rationale: Policy divergence and risk-off flows can lift USD/JPY; watch for BOJ pushback.

predictions.text: The Cboe Volatility Index (ticker: ^VIX) will close at or above 22.00 on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Use the official Cboe closing value for ^VIX (Cboe or Yahoo Finance). Any close >= 22.00 by 2025-11-30 satisfies.
predictions.rationale: Policy/fiscal uncertainty and credit concerns raise tail-risk premia.

predictions.text: From 2025-10-17 close to 2025-11-30 close, SPDR S&P Regional Banking ETF (KRE) will underperform SPDR S&P 500 ETF Trust (SPY) by at least 3.5 percentage points based on adjusted close percentage change.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compute adjusted-close total return between 2025-10-17 and 2025-11-30 (UTC) from Yahoo Finance for KRE and SPY. If [Ret_KRE − Ret_SPY] <= −3.5 pp, the prediction is correct.
monitoring_signals: Bank earnings guidance and net interest margins
predictions.rationale: Rising sour-loan fears and tighter credit conditions disproportionately pressure regional banks.

predictions.text: The Drewry World Container Index (Composite) weekly reading published on or before 2025-11-30 will be at least 25% higher than its 2025-09-05 Composite level.
predictions.verification_criteria: Compare Drewry WCI Composite level on 2025-09-05 with any Composite reading published up to 2025-11-30 at https://www.drewry.co.uk/. Increase >= 25% confirms.
monitoring_signals: Carrier blank sailings and capacity utilization
Red Sea/Suez and Panama Canal disruption reports
predictions.rationale: Tight capacity, disruptions, and tariff front-loading support elevated all-in freight rates.

predictions.text: U.S. total commercial crude oil inventories (excluding SPR) will decline by at least 8.0 million barrels week-over-week in at least one EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report published by 2025-11-15.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use EIA Weekly Petroleum Status Report. A weekly change in total commercial crude stocks <= −8.0 million barrels (Table 1) on any report through 2025-11-15 confirms.
predictions.rationale: Refinery runs and export strength can create a one-off large draw into maintenance transitions.

predictions.text: ISM Manufacturing Prices Index for October 2025 will print at or above 56.0 in ISM’s release due by 2025-11-01.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm with the official ISM Manufacturing Report on Business for October 2025. The ‘Prices’ subindex value >= 56.0 satisfies.
predictions.rationale: Tariffs and freight passthroughs lift input costs, keeping prices paid in expansion.

predictions.text: University of Michigan 5–10 year inflation expectations (final) for October 2025 will print between 2.8% and 3.1%.
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via University of Michigan Surveys of Consumers final release for October 2025; accept the headline 5–10 year inflation expectations measure. Range is inclusive.
predictions.rationale: Long-run expectations appear anchored despite near-term tariff and energy noise.

predictions.text: U.S. Core PCE Price Index (YoY, SA) for September 2025 will print between 2.6% and 2.8% in the BEA release due by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirm in BEA’s Personal Income and Outlays: 12-month percent change in PCE price index excluding food and energy for September 2025 within [2.6%, 2.8%], inclusive.
monitoring_signals: CPI and PPI components feeding into PCE
predictions.rationale: Underlying disinflation continues gradually; tariffs create noise but core YoY drifts to high-2s.

predictions.text: By 2025-11-30, OFAC will sanction at least two entities for facilitating Russia–North Korea arms transfers, as evidenced by new SDN listings or press releases explicitly citing such activity.
predictions.verification_criteria: Check U.S. Treasury press releases and the SDN list updates. At least two new sanctions entries by the deadline must reference Russia–DPRK arms transfers in their basis.
monitoring_signals: UN Panel of Experts or open-source shipment tracking
predictions.rationale: Public reporting of DPRK munitions in Russia raises likelihood of targeted U.S. sanctions.

predictions.text: NYMEX Henry Hub natural gas front-month futures (NG) will settle at or above $3.60 per MMBtu on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30.
predictions.verification_criteria: Use CME settlement prices for the prompt NG contract (e.g., NG1). Any official settlement >= $3.60/MMBtu on or before 2025-11-30 confirms.
monitoring_signals: Freeport LNG and export feedgas flows
predictions.rationale: Seasonal demand, exports, and any supply hiccups can push prompt gas above $3.60.

predictions.text: The U.S. 2-Year Treasury yield (FRED: DGS2) will close at or below 4.30% on at least one trading day by 2025-11-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Verify via FRED series DGS2 daily close. Any observation on or before 2025-11-30 with DGS2 <= 4.30% satisfies.
monitoring_signals: Credit stress indicators and risk-off flows
predictions.rationale: Rising growth-risk and policy-easing expectations can compress the front end.

predictions.text: The U.S. Senate will pass a continuing resolution extending federal funding through at least 2025-12-15 by 2025-10-31.
predictions.verification_criteria: Confirmed by a Senate roll call vote recorded on congress.gov or senate.gov by 2025-10-31, with bill text specifying a CR that extends funding expiration to on/after 2025-12-15.
monitoring_signals: Draft CR text and proposed duration
Airlines and defense industry lobbying pressure
predictions.rationale: Deadline pressure and economic risk typically force at least a short bridge CR through mid-December.
